root:
Samurai The Samurai were trained by a visitor to the Keep of Iron. Despite wearing heavy armor, they are incredibly mobile, and wield a nagamaki to strike upon distant foes. Some possess a cursed blade which demands blood...
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Samurai moves with grace and discipline on the battlefield. His attacks are masterful, utilizing different effects via concise strikes and mobile assault. The Samurai wields a cursed blade which bestows unique properties upon satiating its bloodlust...
Drifting from province to provice, the Samurai has acquired wisdom to share with his new lord. He helps the headstrong hone their ambition and become greater for it. He teaches allies discipline, and to remove oneself from the equation of life.
We serve. We serve.
Lose 4% Resolve Per Stack, Immune If Bleeding
The Bewitched Blade hungers, feeding off Samurai's soul and blood.Beware: Even satiated, the blade will still attempt domination of the Samurai's soul. Practice Bushido to stay noble! Bleeding Activate Bewitched Blade Sate the cursed blade by bleeding the Samurai.Beware: Even satiated, the blade will still attempt domination of the Samurai's soul. Practice Bushido to stay noble!
Elegant Strike Backslash Gliding Stab Bewitched Bloodthirst Piercing Assault Zen Lunge Move Crusader Strike Backslash Gliding Stab Bewitched Bloodthirst Piercing Assault Zen Lunge
Rusty Chokuto Old Chokuto Tachi Nagamaki "Bewitched Alonne Sword" Samurai Weaponry Basic Chestplate Tempered Chestplate Lamellar Armor Samurai Attire "Armor of the Betrayed" Samurai Attire
Others:
Begone, filth.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Bushido Tea Ceremony Honor Bewitched Blade's Curse Sudoku
Offensive Skill Strength Ring Dexterity Ring Stone Ring Vanquisher Seal Bewitched Blade Steel Ring Samurai Soul "Is my own soul at war with the blade, or have we become one?" "Their positioning is weak. Let me demonstrate."
Worry not-- I'll disinfect it first. These wounds are severe. Don't be afraid to use a Soapstone. My mentor was struck down by his pupil. This doesn't compare.
Remember: Your ambition's wasted without wisdom. Collect yourself. We'll prevail.
Hesitation has no place. Act. In the face of defeat, retaliate. Wake from the dream with honor. Every morning a warrior should recommit himself to death. We are truly dead. Abandoning life abandons selfishness. It is then we devote ourselves to the task.
We must become of mind that is right now pure, and lacking complication. If we must perish, we do so in a proper chamber! Inside, the hide of a dog. Outside, the hide of a tiger. This is why we clean.
Life is not so important when choosing between life and integrity. Calculating people are contemptible. They focus upon loss, whereas true warriors aim for greatness. Dying without attaining one's aim is to die a dog's death.
If a person brandishes his sword much, he swings a naked blade. People avoid him, and refuse his company. If a sword remains sheathed, it becomes rusty, the blade dulls, and people think that of its owner. One is not truly a warrior if he refuses to make decisions quickly.
An illogical choice, but samurai do not hesitate! *Marks something with his pencil.* ... is that right? *Sigh* I can't make heads or tails of this.
...
No, there's no honor in it. It is not worthy of my blade.
Filth. I won't bow to you. You've never met a more noble blade. You will not wake me from this dream. I remain dead. Omae wa mou shindeiru. You forgot to bow.
A wandering swordsman meanders into the Hamlet. He brings skill and wisdom-- provided you're noble enough for his company. Eastern Warrior
I cannot suffer defeat!
We will lose and forfeit honor!
I must awaken eventually.
Out-- out-- clean this damnable spot!.
I want to live for myself!
Why strive without a master to serve?
How does one live as a dead man?
I serve.
Drive these vermin from our lord's Hamlet!
We live for the task, and only for the task.
Give them a swift death.
Our kingdom shall grow anew.
Service is virtue.
My task is unfinished. Thus, I am unfinished.
Commit yourself to our king. It is the highest honor! We remain his subjects. Do not falter. Grant our king your utmost resolve!
Claim honor through victory!
Each morning, rise to meet the task. Your utmost-- every fight! I've yet to finish. This dream lasts another day. Will we die dishonorably!? Kill yourselves to preserve honor! The shame is too much! Dishonor-- is it too late!? How swiftly they outmaneuver us! Why must we fail? Wake me, lest I wake myself. Harakiri? Seppuku? Your stance is terrible! Shape up! Your equipment is filthy. Clean it! You dishonor your family! I'm done living for others. Get out of my sight. You deserve nothing. I'm without a home-- a master. ... what good is a samurai without his lord? ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. Remove oneself from the equation!? Why have an equation!? Why not have a farm and live quietly!? Forgive me, my lord, but you killed me! I... should return. I cannot bear the shame. I need some time. The burden of dishonor is too heavy. *He glances down in defeat.* I have failed. Awaken me from this dream. Wake with me. One of us wakes, today. Dead or alive!? Any choice, but make it quickly! I need no justification. I'm too honorable for this. I will not sully my nobility! Not challenging enough. End it. I have no purpose. Mine is to serve, and I have served. Let me wake. Set this sword in my family's tomb. I forget myself-- No more strife. Please. The glory is mine! I want top damage! Let's end this so I can disappear. I live for myself, now! Who needs a lord? Forget duty. I'm finished. It will surely mean defeat! We have no time! I'd rather end myself. I must die with honor, not live in cowardice! I can't! It is the coward's choice. It's a bad idea. Not for me! My life, my decision. You aren't my lord. Lordless men will never function. This blade will win over me. I feel its bloodlust consuming me. Is choosing not to act an action!? Choice is an illusion. One can never choose not to choose. Preserve your honor! Ought I end myself now!? Avoid defeat at all costs! Death is truly the beginning. Strike. Attack. You're all filthy as garbage. Tsk. Clean the floors better, next time. You're all my inferiors. I can make my own choices. Feudalism is unnecessary, now. I have become my own lord. I... can't. No, I am unworthy. I'm not worthy of this weapon any more. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! It just came off cooldown! ... our honor will fade with the tide. Defeat is inevitable. This blade is too much for me. They will surely win if this is our limit. So fatigued, already? We can't keep pace with hordes of foes. Kindle it with your very soul! Tomorrow, I wake. The dream ends soon. Death is a new beginning. For the love of Vendrick, clean the damned floors! This filth is disgusting. Fetch a wet rag! Put your back into scrubbing this filth. Now. I'll stay... Alonne. I don't need you. This blade requires enough of my focus, thanks. We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. It's time. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Hit me. Honor demands a duel. This samurai has no will to continue. I'm ready for death. Brandish your weapon! I can dodge anything! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! You'd make a cleaner corpse! You're a pig in need of a bath. Duel me now-- for honor! We must prove our worth via duel! The blade hungers. Blood! This sword will claim my own life. The sword is cursed. Let it consume me. Only one person has enough honor to hit me-- me! Only I may strike upon myself. If we retreat, we forfeit honor! We must not. No. I have no lord. My purpose is gone. A lordless death is all I deserve. Now is my time. No. No other task remains. We need to end this battle. I am no coward! How can I wake up if I don't sleep first!? Must I deliver my own death? I will preserve my honor if needed... Stave off the blade! It must feed! Get them off! Need healing! One step closer. My will ends at the tip of this blade! Why fight when death is inevitable? Where's my rightful lord!? Defeat looms ever closer! I... failed? My weapon will feed upon me, soon! I can't overcome its otherworldly will! Mulligan. Don't worry about seppuku at this rate! No lord's present to see my disgrace-- Thank Heaven. It dodged. Drat. We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic rat. Hardly noticed. Perfect your form. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. It fat rolled. Don't celebrate. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! Just run, you'll die to your own blade at this rate! You fight like common riff raff! Your aim is as garbage as your hygiene. I should have summoned phantoms... You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Fool! You are not dedicated to the task! Clearly you are not samurai. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Deserved it. Fool. Deserved it. Fool. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. Scrub, you don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. I'm staying at my pillar. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's Estus? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Traitor! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. I refuse. Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was weak. Disappointing. Still disappointing. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... Is this the dream's end!? This is where we die? My sword hungers, even here... I can't recall a worse place. My sword would devour me! My honor would be forfeit! It would bring loss. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're as healthy as pig shit. Your best is not good enough! You're unclean and uncouth! I make the choices. Not you. I will die of my own volition. I need a moment. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. ... fine. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!
---------------

Samurai The Samurai were trained by a visitor to the Keep of Iron. Despite wearing heavy armor, they are incredibly mobile, and wield a nagamaki to strike upon distant foes. Some possess a cursed blade which demands blood...
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Samurai moves with grace and discipline on the battlefield. His attacks are masterful, utilizing different effects via concise strikes and mobile assault. The Samurai wields a cursed blade which bestows unique properties upon satiating its bloodlust...
Drifting from province to provice, the Samurai has acquired wisdom to share with his new lord. He helps the headstrong hone their ambition and become greater for it. He teaches allies discipline, and to remove oneself from the equation of life.
We serve. We serve.
Bleeding Activate Bewitched Blade Sate the cursed blade by bleeding the Samurai.Beware: Even satiated, the blade will still attempt domination of the Samurai's soul. Practice Bushido to stay noble! The blade doesn't resonate with Unholy creatures. Lose 4% Resolve Per Stack, Immune If Bleeding

Lose 4% Resolve Per Stack, Immune If Bleeding Bleeding The blade doesn't resonate with Unholy creatures. Activate Bewitched Blade Sate the cursed blade by bleeding the Samurai.Beware: Even satiated, the blade will still attempt domination of the Samurai's soul. Practice Bushido to stay noble! Others:
Begone, filth.
Wound Care Encourage Pep Talk Bushido Tea Ceremony Honor Bewitched Blade's Curse Sudoku
Offensive Skill Strength Ring Dexterity Ring Stone Ring Vanquisher Seal Bewitched Blade Steel Ring Samurai Soul "Is my own soul at war with the blade, or have we become one?" "Their positioning is weak. Let me demonstrate."
Worry not-- I'll disinfect it first. These wounds are severe. Don't be afraid to use a Soapstone. My mentor was struck down by his pupil. This doesn't compare.
Remember: Your ambition's wasted without wisdom. Collect yourself. We'll prevail.
Hesitation has no place. Act. In the face of defeat, retaliate. Wake from the dream with honor. Every morning a warrior should recommit himself to death. We are truly dead. Abandoning life abandons selfishness. It is then we devote ourselves to the task.
We must become of mind that is right now pure, and lacking complication. If we must perish, we do so in a proper chamber! Inside, the hide of a dog. Outside, the hide of a tiger. This is why we clean.
Life is not so important when choosing between life and integrity. Calculating people are contemptible. They focus upon loss, whereas true warriors aim for greatness. Dying without attaining one's aim is to die a dog's death.
If a person brandishes his sword much, he swings a naked blade. People avoid him, and refuse his company. If a sword remains sheathed, it becomes rusty, the blade dulls, and people think that of its owner. One is not truly a warrior if he refuses to make decisions quickly.
An illogical choice, but samurai do not hesitate! *Marks something with his pencil.* ... is that right? *Sigh* I can't make heads or tails of this.
...
No, there's no honor in it. It is not worthy of my blade.
Filth. I won't bow to you. You've never met a more noble blade. You will not wake me from this dream. I remain dead. Omae wa mou shindeiru. You forgot to bow.
A wandering swordsman meanders into the Hamlet. He brings skill and wisdom-- provided you're noble enough for his company. Eastern Warrior
I cannot suffer defeat!
We will lose and forfeit honor!
I must awaken eventually.
Out-- out-- clean this damnable spot!.
I want to live for myself!
Why strive without a master to serve?
How does one live as a dead man?
I serve.
Drive these vermin from our lord's Hamlet!
We live for the task, and only for the task.
Give them a swift death.
Our kingdom shall grow anew.
Service is virtue.
My task is unfinished. Thus, I am unfinished.
Commit yourself to our king. It is the highest honor! We remain his subjects. Do not falter. Grant our king your utmost resolve!
Claim honor through victory!
Each morning, rise to meet the task. Your utmost-- every fight! I've yet to finish. This dream lasts another day. Will we die dishonorably!? Kill yourselves to preserve honor! The shame is too much! Dishonor-- is it too late!? How swiftly they outmaneuver us! Why must we fail? Wake me, lest I wake myself. Harakiri? Seppuku? Your stance is terrible! Shape up! Your equipment is filthy. Clean it! You dishonor your family! I'm done living for others. Get out of my sight. You deserve nothing. I'm without a home-- a master. ... what good is a samurai without his lord? ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. Remove oneself from the equation!? Why have an equation!? Why not have a farm and live quietly!? Forgive me, my lord, but you killed me! I... should return. I cannot bear the shame. I need some time. The burden of dishonor is too heavy. *He glances down in defeat.* I have failed. Awaken me from this dream. Wake with me. One of us wakes, today. Dead or alive!? Any choice, but make it quickly! I need no justification. I'm too honorable for this. I will not sully my nobility! Not challenging enough. End it. I have no purpose. Mine is to serve, and I have served. Let me wake. Set this sword in my family's tomb. I forget myself-- No more strife. Please. The glory is mine! I want top damage! Let's end this so I can disappear. I live for myself, now! Who needs a lord? Forget duty. I'm finished. It will surely mean defeat! We have no time! I'd rather end myself. I must die with honor, not live in cowardice! I can't! It is the coward's choice. It's a bad idea. Not for me! My life, my decision. You aren't my lord. Lordless men will never function. This blade will win over me. I feel its bloodlust consuming me. Is choosing not to act an action!? Choice is an illusion. One can never choose not to choose. Preserve your honor! Ought I end myself now!? Avoid defeat at all costs! Death is truly the beginning. Strike. Attack. You're all filthy as garbage. Tsk. Clean the floors better, next time. You're all my inferiors. I can make my own choices. Feudalism is unnecessary, now. I have become my own lord. I... can't. No, I am unworthy. I'm not worthy of this weapon any more. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! It just came off cooldown! ... our honor will fade with the tide. Defeat is inevitable. This blade is too much for me. They will surely win if this is our limit. So fatigued, already? We can't keep pace with hordes of foes. Kindle it with your very soul! Tomorrow, I wake. The dream ends soon. Death is a new beginning. For the love of Vendrick, clean the damned floors! This filth is disgusting. Fetch a wet rag! Put your back into scrubbing this filth. Now. I'll stay... Alonne. I don't need you. This blade requires enough of my focus, thanks. We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. It's time. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Hit me. Honor demands a duel. This samurai has no will to continue. I'm ready for death. Brandish your weapon! I can dodge anything! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! You'd make a cleaner corpse! You're a pig in need of a bath. Duel me now-- for honor! We must prove our worth via duel! The blade hungers. Blood! This sword will claim my own life. The sword is cursed. Let it consume me. Only one person has enough honor to hit me-- me! Only I may strike upon myself. If we retreat, we forfeit honor! We must not. No. I have no lord. My purpose is gone. A lordless death is all I deserve. Now is my time. No. No other task remains. We need to end this battle. I am no coward! How can I wake up if I don't sleep first!? Must I deliver my own death? I will preserve my honor if needed... Stave off the blade! It must feed! Get them off! Need healing! One step closer. My will ends at the tip of this blade! Why fight when death is inevitable? Where's my rightful lord!? Defeat looms ever closer! I... failed? My weapon will feed upon me, soon! I can't overcome its otherworldly will! Mulligan. Don't worry about seppuku at this rate! No lord's present to see my disgrace-- Thank Heaven. It dodged. Drat. We'll lose if we hit like that. I'm dead at this rate... Pathetic rat. Hardly noticed. Perfect your form. It probably couldn't dodge, anyway. It fat rolled. Don't celebrate. They're going to follow-up! That's it! We're dead! We're going to die if you keep missing! Just run, you'll die to your own blade at this rate! You fight like common riff raff! Your aim is as garbage as your hygiene. I should have summoned phantoms... You're not keeping ME alive, at this rate. Fool! You are not dedicated to the task! Clearly you are not samurai. We need to leave if that's your best. Uh... let's retreat. Will you follow-up!? What!? Was that fun? That seemed strong. A fly would have done more damage. With damage like that, you'll never win the arena. Deserved it. Fool. Deserved it. Fool. They'll kill you! What-- how did you miss? They'll demolish us! They're just better than we are! Ah, you're not hit capped. Clearly he had Evasion. We need to move back... This is a bad idea. Did you see that? They're-- everywhere! Come on, I'm itching for a fight. No, here suits me. Scrub, you don't tell me what to do. You're all garbage. I'm staying at my pillar. I demand a pillar. Where's the pillar? No, might be corrupted. Could be poisoned. No. I choose blood. That is meaningless... There is no reason to do that... I didn't buy that! Wait-- are you sure it's Estus? I have necrosis! No-- it's a trap! Traitor! Noob. When I need to, scrub. Why are you such a casual? Trivial. There is only one ending for this. It won't make or break the fight. I don't need that right now. No! The light will mend me. Honor compels me in this duel. I'm good for now. This is a terrible time. Why now? I MUST feel this! I will endure a bit longer-- for honor! A little pain soothes the soul. Send it to my kin. Keep it for yourself. It's just wasted on me. I refuse. Don't need it. It's a duel!
That was weak. Disappointing. Still disappointing. Fascinating! Interesting... Compelling... Is this the dream's end!? This is where we die? My sword hungers, even here... I can't recall a worse place. My sword would devour me! My honor would be forfeit! It would bring loss. We need to fight something soon... I'm ready to win. Let's move on? Let's duel while we're here! You're as healthy as pig shit. Your best is not good enough! You're unclean and uncouth! I make the choices. Not you. I will die of my own volition. I need a moment. This journey will end us. The results will be the same. I feel our end coming. Let's sleep with two eyes open. We don't need sleep. Flee to the bedcovers! This is a bad idea. That won't help us survive. Gestures of a fool! It'll kill me! All I need is the battlefield. No, I'd rather a sword. No, I don't a scrub like you! No, we're better off without you. ... fine. Let me rest a bit. This doesn't change anything. We are doomed. No point. I will lead us to victory. Not you. It's not for me. Do we really need to eat now? This doesn't taste right. Fighting's all the food I need! I'm good to go, thanks. I'm ready without it. It can always use a bit more salt. I wish we had some chicken. I would love a steak right now. Let's eat later. Eh, it tastes horrible!

Samurai The Samurai were trained by a visitor to the Keep of Iron. Despite wearing heavy armor, they are incredibly mobile, and wield a nagamaki to strike upon distant foes. Some possess a cursed blade which demands blood...
No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.
The Samurai moves with grace and discipline on the battlefield. His attacks are masterful, utilizing different effects via concise strikes and mobile assault. The Samurai wields a cursed blade which bestows unique properties upon satiating its bloodlust...
Drifting from province to provice, the Samurai has acquired wisdom to share with his new lord. He helps the headstrong hone their ambition and become greater for it. He teaches allies discipline, and to remove oneself from the equation of life.
We serve. We serve.

Practice Bushido to stay noble! The blade doesn't resonate with Unholy creatures. If a person brandishes his sword much, he swings a naked blade. People avoid him, and refuse his company. If a sword remains sheathed, it becomes rusty, the blade dulls, and people think that of its owner. One is not truly a warrior if he refuses to make decisions quickly.
An illogical choice, but samurai do not hesitate! *Marks something with his pencil.* ... is that right? *Sigh* I can't make heads or tails of this.
...
No, there's no honor in it. It is not worthy of my blade.
Filth. I won't bow to you. You've never met a more noble blade. You will not wake me from this dream. I remain dead. Omae wa mou shindeiru. You forgot to bow.
A wandering swordsman meanders into the Hamlet. He brings skill and wisdom-- provided you're noble enough for his company. Eastern Warrior
I cannot suffer defeat!
We will lose and forfeit honor!
I must awaken eventually.
Out-- out-- clean this damnable spot!.
I want to live for myself!
Why strive without a master to serve?
How does one live as a dead man?
I serve.
Drive these vermin from our lord's Hamlet!
We live for the task, and only for the task.
Give them a swift death.
Our kingdom shall grow anew.
Service is virtue.
My task is unfinished. Thus, I am unfinished.
Commit yourself to our king. It is the highest honor! We remain his subjects. Do not falter. Grant our king your utmost resolve!
Claim honor through victory!
Each morning, rise to meet the task. Your utmost-- every fight! I've yet to finish. This dream lasts another day. Will we die dishonorably!? Kill yourselves to preserve honor! The shame is too much! Dishonor-- is it too late!? How swiftly they outmaneuver us! Why must we fail? Wake me, lest I wake myself. Harakiri? Seppuku? Your stance is terrible! Shape up! Your equipment is filthy. Clean it! You dishonor your family! I'm done living for others. Get out of my sight. You deserve nothing. I'm without a home-- a master. ... what good is a samurai without his lord? ... war is boredom punctuated by pulsating terror. Remove oneself from the equation!? Why have an equation!? Why not have a farm and live quietly!? Forgive me, my lord, but you killed me! I... should return. I cannot bear the shame. I need some time. The burden of dishonor is too heavy. *He glances down in defeat.* I have failed. Awaken me from this dream. Wake with me. One of us wakes, today. Dead or alive!? Any choice, but make it quickly! I need no justification. I'm too honorable for this. I will not sully my nobility! Not challenging enough. End it. I have no purpose. Mine is to serve, and I have served. Let me wake. Set this sword in my family's tomb. I forget myself-- No more strife. Please. The glory is mine! I want top damage! Let's end this so I can disappear. I live for myself, now! Who needs a lord? Forget duty. I'm finished. It will surely mean defeat! We have no time! I'd rather end myself. I must die with honor, not live in cowardice! I can't! It is the coward's choice. It's a bad idea. Not for me! My life, my decision. You aren't my lord. Lordless men will never function. This blade will win over me. I feel its bloodlust consuming me. Is choosing not to act an action!? Choice is an illusion. One can never choose not to choose. Preserve your honor! Ought I end myself now!? Avoid defeat at all costs! Death is truly the beginning. Strike. Attack. You're all filthy as garbage. Tsk. Clean the floors better, next time. You're all my inferiors. I can make my own choices. Feudalism is unnecessary, now. I have become my own lord. I... can't. No, I am unworthy. I'm not worthy of this weapon any more. I do what I please. Did it work last time? Trying new tactics! It just came off cooldown! ... our honor will fade with the tide. Defeat is inevitable. This blade is too much for me. They will surely win if this is our limit. So fatigued, already? We can't keep pace with hordes of foes. Kindle it with your very soul! Tomorrow, I wake. The dream ends soon. Death is a new beginning. For the love of Vendrick, clean the damned floors! This filth is disgusting. Fetch a wet rag! Put your back into scrubbing this filth. Now. I'll stay... Alonne. I don't need you. This blade requires enough of my focus, thanks. We need an end... is this one so bad? This will not end well for us. It's time. I'm surprised we don't bring mana potions... I'm surprised by the lack of pillar use in our fights. Do you use mana? Hit me. Honor demands a duel. This samurai has no will to continue. I'm ready for death. Brandish your weapon! I can dodge anything! Stop betraying our motives! You're giving away our tactics! You'd make a cleaner corpse! You're a pig in need of a bath. Duel me now-- for honor! We must prove our worth via duel! The blade hungers. Blood! This sword will claim my own life. The sword is cursed. Let it consume me. Only one person has enough honor to hit me-- me! Only I may strike upon myself. If we retreat, we forfeit honor! We must not. No. I have no lord. My purpose is gone. A lordless death is all I deserve. Now is my time. No. No other task remains. We need to end this battle. I am no coward! How can I wake up if I don't sleep first!? Must I deliver my own death? I will preserve my honor if needed... Stave off the blade! It must feed! Get them off! Need healing! One step closer. My will ends at the tip of this blade! Why fight when death is inevitable? Just run, you'll die to your own blade at this rate! You fight like common riff raff! Your aim is as garbage as your hygiene. I should have summoned phantoms... No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here. No. His task is elsewhere. Mine is here.

Drifting from province to provice, the Samurai has acquired wisdom to share with his new lord. He helps the headstrong hone their ambition and become greater for it. He teaches allies discipline, and to remove oneself from the equation of life.
We serve. We serve.

Practice Bushido to stay noble! The blade doesn't resonate with Unholy creatures.
